name: Taste of Your Own Medicine (Chaos Panda)
name_original: Taste of Your Own Medicine (Chaos Panda)
description:
Sling Potions to compete in Taste Of Your Own Medicine! A two to four player local party game where you fling, mix and battle it out to prove which of you is the best Alchemist! 

Taste of Your Own Medicine is a up to 4 local-multiplayer game, battle against your friends and become the best at potion mastery!

FEATURES

- Combine potion splashes with each other to create deadly new opportunities to wipe out your competitors!

- Pick out of three maps to your liking to brawl it out with unique designs and events!

- Four playable characters with unique personalities to choose from!

- Cause chaos by knocking and blasting objects with your potions!

TEAM

Artist:

- Anna Ross

- Cody Smith

- Gwyneth Esteban

Game Designers:

- Kade Richards

- Ruby Andreatta

Programmer:

- Benjamin Scott

Composer:

- Lord James Williams
